title: Draft a Cease and Desist Letter
description: An attorney needs to draft a cease and desist letter to a third party who is infringing on a client's trademark.

tasks.description: Gather evidence of the trademark infringement (e.g., screenshots of the infringing use).
Select the firm's standard cease and desist letter template.
Draft the letter, identifying the client's trademark, describing the infringing activity, and demanding that the activity cease immediately to avoid legal action.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a strong and clear demand letter.
